page.title: 16GARAGE AND GIFT SHOP
page.content: {The West End of Clevedon}is not the main shopping area of the town but there are a few small shops and one large garage. {West End Gift Shop. The shop is thirty years old and has had four owners. The present owner is Mr.J.F.Hastell.The shop is next to the popular tourist spot-{Salthouse {Fields}so the busiest time is July- September.They have had one burglary. They sell small gifts,ice creams etc. {Jeff Browns Garage.} Their busiest time of the year is also the summer when they sell 500 gallons of petrol per day but for selling cars it is just before August.They sell about 800 cars per year.They have had 2 burglaries,one in the shop for cigarettes and one in the office.
